00063 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 void CCannedTxtMsgDlg::DoDataExchange
00065     (
00066     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00067     )
00068 {
00069     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00070     DDX_Control( aDataExchange, IDC_CANMSG_LST_MESSAGES, mCannedMessageList );
00071     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_CANMSG_EDIT_ID, mMessageId );
00072     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_CANMSG_EDIT_TEXT, mMessageText );
00073     DDX_LBIndex( aDataExchange, IDC_CANMSG_LST_MESSAGES, mSelectedIndex );
00074 }

00082 BOOL CCannedTxtMsgDlg::OnInitDialog()
00083 {
00084     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00085     updateListBox();
00086     SetWindowPos( NULL, 700, 625, 0, 0, SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOZORDER );
00087     return TRUE;
00088 }    /* OnInitDialog() */

00090 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void CCannedTxtMsgDlg::updateListBox()
00095 {
00096     CString listItem;
00097 
00098     //must keep track of where the list was scrolled to
00099     //since we reset content we must reinitialize these
00100     int selectedIndex = mCannedMessageList.GetCurSel();
00101     int topIndex = mCannedMessageList.GetTopIndex();
00102 
00103     //reset content and add current canned messages to list
00104     mCannedMessageList.ResetContent();
00105     FileBackedMap<ClientListItem>::const_iterator iter;
00106 
00107     for( iter = mCom.mCannedMessages.begin();
00108          iter != mCom.mCannedMessages.end();
00109          iter++ )
00110     {
00111         if( iter->second.isValid() )
00112         {
00113             listItem.Format( _T("%d - %s"), iter->first, iter->second.getCurrentName() );
00114             mCannedMessageList.AddString( listItem );
00115         }
00116     }
00117     //reset scroll and selection
00118     mCannedMessageList.SetCurSel( selectedIndex );
00119     mCannedMessageList.SetTopIndex( topIndex );
00120 }    /* updateListBox() */
00121 
00122 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00126 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 afx_msg LPARAM CCannedTxtMsgDlg::OnCannedMsgListChanged( WPARAM, LPARAM )
00128 {
00129     updateListBox();
00130     return 0;
00131 }    /* OnCannedMsgListChanged() */

00133 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 void CCannedTxtMsgDlg::OnEnChangeEditBoxes()
00139 {
00140     UpdateData( TRUE );
00141     if( mMessageText != "" && mMessageId != "" )
00142     {
00143         GetDlgItem( IDC_CANMSG_BTN_SEND )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00144     }
00145     else
00146     {
00147         GetDlgItem( IDC_CANMSG_BTN_SEND )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00148     }
00149 }    /* OnEnChangeEditBoxes */
00150 
00151 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00156 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00157 void CCannedTxtMsgDlg::OnLbnSelchangeMsglist()
00158 {
00159     CListBox * messageListBox = (CListBox *)GetDlgItem( IDC_CANMSG_LST_MESSAGES );
00160     int selectedIndex = messageListBox->GetCurSel();
00161     if( selectedIndex >= 0 && selectedIndex < messageListBox->GetCount() )
00162     {
00163         int index = 0;
00164         CString str;
00165         messageListBox->GetText( selectedIndex, str );
00166         index = str.Find( _T("-"), 0 );
00167         if( index > 0 )
00168         {
00169             TCHAR * itemBuffer = str.GetBuffer();
00170             TCHAR * messageId = new TCHAR[index];
00171             memcpy( messageId, itemBuffer, ( index - 1 ) * sizeof( TCHAR ) );
00172             messageId[index-1] = '\0';
00173             mMessageId.Format( _T("%s"), messageId );
00174             int messageTextLength = str.GetLength()-index-1;
00175             TCHAR * messageText = new TCHAR[messageTextLength];
00176             memcpy( messageText, itemBuffer + index + 2, ( messageTextLength - 1 ) * sizeof( TCHAR ) );
00177             messageText[messageTextLength - 1] = '\0';
00178             mMessageText.Format( _T("%s"), messageText );
00179             str.ReleaseBuffer();
00180             delete[] messageId;
00181             delete[] messageText;
00182             UpdateData( FALSE );
00183         }
00184     }
00185     messageListBox->SetCurSel( selectedIndex );
00186 }
00187 
00188 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 void CCannedTxtMsgDlg::OnBnClickedDelete()
00194 {
00195     UpdateData( TRUE );
00196     if( mSelectedIndex >= 0 )
00197     {
00198         mCom.sendDeleteCannedMessageRequest( mCom.mCannedMessages.getKeyAt( mSelectedIndex ) );
00199     }
00200 }    /* OnBnClickedDelete() */
00201 
00202 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00207 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 void CCannedTxtMsgDlg::OnBnClickedSend()
00209 {
00210     UpdateData( TRUE );
00211     uint32 messageId = _ttoi( mMessageId.GetBuffer() );
00212 
00213     mCom.sendCannedMessage( messageId, mMessageText );
00214 }    /* OnBnClickedSend() */
